JOB DESCRIPTION: Requirements     In our Software Engineering Group, we look for people who are passionate around solving business problems through innovation and engineering practices.   Strong experience in java, spring boot, rest web services, oracle database, Good to have POS domain knowledge / Cloud AWS   Ability to quickly and accurately estimate cost and effort needed to deliver a feature   Build strategic generic tech solutions that can be reused and leveraged across business areas   Possess framework mindset, in terms of building components/libraries that can be easily ported/integrated/upgraded with minimal effort by various applications   Work effectively within collaborative team to identify and resolve issues
